column1: The '''Mountain Wall''' was a term that appears just once
column2: in [[Bilbo Baggins]]'s poem ''[[Eärendil]] was a mariner'' quoted above. The meaning is not completely certain
column3: but it seems to describe the [[Pelóri]]
column4: the [[Mountains of Defence]] that ranged along the eastern borders of [[Valinor]].
